Uses of Interface
com.flir.flironesdk.Device.Delegate

    • Uses of Device.Delegate in com.flir.flironesdk

      Methods in com.flir.flironesdk with parameters of type Device.Delegate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Device.startDiscovery(Context context, Device.Delegate delegate)
      Call this method to connect to a FLIR One device, typically you should call this from your activity's onResume method, passing your app context and device delegate.
      Constructors in com.flir.flironesdk with parameters of type Device.Delegate 
      Constructor and Description
      SimulatedDevice(Device.Delegate delegate, java.io.InputStream sampleFramesZipData, float initialBatteryPercentage)
      Constructs a simulated device that can stream a frame loop provided in a zip file with connectSimulatedDevice.
